model.info:
Polynomial Regression model using sklearn package with a model containing
    the following step: PolyFeatures, LinearRegression. MinMaxScaling was removed 
    in this version where the data was normalized to be with the allowed domain of 
    the problem. Such that the data was normalized between 0 and 1 given that 
                X: [0,2048] pixel and 
                PWCPOS: [PWCPOS_CMD-PWCPOS_STD, PWCPOS_CMD+PWCPOS_STD] deg 
    The metadata regarding the fitted model is provided that summarizes the key aspects 
    needed for pastasoss. A few of meta data feaures have been replace to None as they
    are not releveant with this setup.
    
    Model performance measured RMS:  0.829 ± 0.326 [pixel]
    
    (Note) These models be deprecated in future versions as improvements are made as well as 
    how the models are stored and loaded for use in pastasoss.
